DisplayForm.Script: <UiScreen infoLevel="Normal"> <Title></Title> <Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="./UIJOB_TEST.xml"> <Label>Submit</Label> </Op> <Op type="Back" action="./UIJOB_TEST.xml"> <Label imgsrc="IMAGE.jpg">Back</Label> </Op> </Operations> <IoScreen> <IoObject> <Title>idscanner Title</Title> <Description>idscanner Message Description</Description> <IdScanner id="CardInput"> <Label imgsrc="./IMAGE.jpg">Please card swipe!!</Label> </IdScanner> </IoObject> </IoScreen> </UiScreen>
